page.title: 10MONK'S WALK SCHOOL
page.content: Monk's Walk Secondary School, Knightsfield, was opened in 1964 and is a comprehensive school designed to accommodate about nine hundred pupils. There are about sixty teachers. September 1985 will mark the twenty-first anniversary of the school's opening and celebrations are to take place then. The school is situated in Knightsfield, Welwyn Garden City, and is adjacent to the A1(M). The school has an age range of 11 to 18 and the headmaster is Mr R F Foster, BA. The school has extensive facilities, an indoor swimming pool, gymnasium, a very large playing field with football, rugby and cricket pitches as well as a grass running track and a youth club in the grounds for both lunch-time and out-of-school use.
